Class CoffeeService

java.lang.Object
CoffeeService
public class CoffeeService extends Object
Represents a service for managing coffees. The business logic happens here instead of in the models.

This uses a standard Java list instead of a dedicated repository.

    • getCoffeesByTruck

      public List<Coffee> getCoffeesByTruck(Truck truck)
      Gets all coffees a truck can brew.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck that can brew the coffees.
      Returns:
      The coffees the truck can brew.

    • addSyrup

      public Map<Ingredient, Double> addSyrup(Truck truck, Ingredient syrup, int amount)
      Adds syrup to an already brewed coffee. This will decrease the capacities of relevant storage bins.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to add from.
      syrup - The syrup to add.
      amount - The amount of syrup to add.
      Returns:
      The ingredients used mapped to their amounts.

    • brewCoffee

      public Map<Ingredient, Double> brewCoffee(Truck truck, Coffee coffee, CoffeeSize size, EspressoRatio ratio)
      Brews a coffee. This will decrease the capacities of relevant storage bins.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to brew from.
      coffee - The coffee to brew.
      size - The size of the coffee.
      ratio - The espresso ratio to use.
      Returns:
      The ingredients used mapped to their amounts.

    • brewEspressoShots

      public Map<Ingredient, Double> brewEspressoShots(Truck truck, double count, EspressoRatio ratio)
      Brews espresso shots. This will decrease the capacities of relevant storage bins.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to brew from.
      count - The number of espresso shots to brew.
      ratio - The espresso ratio to use.
      Returns:
      The ingredients used mapped to their amounts.

    • canAddSyrup

      public boolean canAddSyrup(Truck truck, Ingredient syrup, int amount) throws InsufficientCapacityException
      Asserts that a truck has the ingredients to add syrup to a coffee.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to check.
      syrup - The syrup to check against.
      amount - The amount of syrup to add.
      Returns:
      Whether the truck has the ingredients to add the syrup.
      Throws:
      InsufficientCapacityException - If the truck does not have the ingredients to add the syrup.

    • canBrewCoffee

      public boolean canBrewCoffee(Truck truck, Coffee coffee, CoffeeSize size, EspressoRatio ratio) throws InsufficientCapacityException
      Asserts that a truck has the ingredients to brew a coffee.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to check.
      coffee - The coffee to check against.
      size - The size of the coffee.
      ratio - The espresso ratio to use.
      Returns:
      Whether the truck has the ingredients to brew the coffee.
      Throws:
      InsufficientCapacityException - If the truck does not have the ingredients to brew the coffee.

    • canBrewEspressoShots

      public boolean canBrewEspressoShots(Truck truck, double count, EspressoRatio ratio) throws InsufficientCapacityException
      Asserts that a truck has the ingredients to brew espresso shots.
      Parameters:
      truck - The coffee to check.
      count - The number of espresso shots to brew.
      ratio - The espresso ratio to use.
      Returns:
      Whether the truck has the ingredients to brew espresso shots.
      Throws:
      InsufficientCapacityException - If the truck does not have the ingredients to brew espresso shots.

    • isCapableOfBrewing

      Checks whether a truck can brew any coffee.

      Returns:

    • isCapableOfBrewing

      coffee - The coffee to check against.

    • isPricesSet

      public boolean isPricesSet()
      Checks whether the prices of the coffees and add-ons have been set.
      Returns:
      Whether the prices of the coffees and add-ons are not equal to Product.DEFAULT_PRICE.
